/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.admin.bbs.repository.BoardMapper.getBoardList */ select row_number() over(order by cb.reg_dt desc) as num , cb.brd_id , cb.brd_type --보드타입 , cb.brd_sj , cb.brd_cn , cb.noti_inq_cnt , cb.pup_yn , cb.pup_bg_dt , cb.pup_ed_dt , cb.ord , cb.file_group_id , cb.reg_id , to_char(cb.reg_dt, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as reg_date , cb.mod_id , cb.mod_dt , (case when #{lang} = 'lng_type_1' then view.user_nm_kg else view.user_nm_ru end) as reg_nm from com_board cb left join kgst.view_user_member view on view.user_id = cb.reg_id where cb.brd_type = #{brdType}
and cb.brd_sj like concat('%', #{brdSj}, '%')

select row_number() over(order by reg_dt desc) as num , brd_id , brd_type , brd_sj , brd_cn , noti_inq_cnt , pup_yn , pup_bg_dt , pup_ed_dt , ord , file_group_id , reg_id , reg_dt , mod_id , mod_dt from com_board where brd_id = #{brdId}
select brd_id , brd_type , brd_sj , brd_cn , TO_CHAR(reg_dt, 'DD/MM/YY') AS reg_dt from com_board where brd_type = #{brdType} order by brd_id desc limit 5

select brd_id , brd_type , brd_sj , brd_cn , noti_inq_cnt , pup_yn , pup_bg_dt , pup_ed_dt , ord , file_group_id , reg_id , reg_dt , mod_id , mod_dt from sndb.com_board where 1=1 and brd_type = 'NOTI' and pup_yn = 'Y' and (pup_bg_dt is null or to_char(current_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= pup_bg_dt) and (pup_ed_dt is null or to_char(current_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= pup_ed_dt)
